name: Edge Of The World (Croben Games)
description:
Edge Of The Worldis a mini-game inspired by flat-earthers and conspiracy theories. This game also served as my entry for July, as part of my 2019 self-challenge of one game per month.

HOW TO PLAY
Collect points and look for the edge of the world.

CONTROLS
WASD or Arrow Keys to "MOVE"
Space to "JUMP"
Escape or Numpad Enter to Pause

TOOLS
Audacity
Bfxr
Gimp
Inkscape Studio
Kdenlive
OBS
Unity3D Visual Studio Community
VLC

BGM BY TECHNOAXE
Synthwave D - Royalty Free Music

The Cat Ate My Homework - Comedy/Trailer - Royalty Free Music
